title: Payments Tab Notification - if payment source disappears in contract update for a manually modified payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has manually modified a payment on the Payments tab of an MJC for a player (signing bonus, option etc) and saved the contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user deletes the Payment Source for these modified payments (signing bonus, option etc)
AND clicks Save on the MJC
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should be generated on BOC notifications widget
AND description should read: "Payment Tracking - No longer calculating a payment which had manually modified values"
AND description should be a hyperlink to the affected Contract

title: LRD user access the Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has navigated to the Major Contracts dashboard on left nav
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Payroll Reports Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load 
AND by default the utility will only display the Year and Type dropdowns. Both default to blank. 
AND the View button is also visible but is disabled.  
AND Year dropdown has all previous year for which reports have been saved, and the current year and following year.

title: Generate a New Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility 
AND has selected a Year and "New" for Type [C182117]
AND has completed the "As of" and "Save As" fields 
AND the Generate Button is now active
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Generate
custom_expected:
THEN  Clicking Generate will generate the CBT Impact Player Details Report, and the LRD Impact Player Details report and display the report in the utility, per the wireframe (styling and other specifics to be handled in follow up stories). 
AND CBT Impact Player Details will be displayed by default. 

AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: LRD user views a different Org's LRD 40-Man Payroll or CBT Payroll
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report (saved or generated)
custom_steps: WHEN the user changes the "Org" dropdown and the "Show" dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the report will update based on the selected dropdowns

title: View existing Saved Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a Year and selects anything OTHER than "New"
custom_expected:
THEN the View button becomes active 
AND clicking View will load the saved report

title: LRD User Edits Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Saved or newly generated Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN the form will load in edit mode 
AND all filters will become disabled 
AND only the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed will not be editable. All other fields will be editable

title: LRD User Saves changes to a Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has made edits to a Payroll Report [C182455]
AND is still in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN all entered values will be saved 
AND the form will load in view mode 
AND a successful blue notification will display

title: Access Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user (admin-boc-all) has clicked Major Contracts from left navigation
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Payroll Forecast tab that displays
custom_expected: THEN the utility will load and display the Yeah, Show, and Org dropdowns

title: Default Dropdowns for Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user first views the dropdowns
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdowns  should default as follows: 

1. Year dropdown has the current year and the next 10 years contained in the dropdown, and defaults to the following year. (Ex: Right now in 2016 it would start at 2016 and go out to 2026, but default to 2017). 
2. Show dropdown contains All Players and Manually Modified Only options, and defaults to "All Players". 
3. Org defaults to "All", and has All and each of the 30 Orgs as an option.

title: View Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects values for each dropdown 
AND clicks the activated View button
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load and display the selected criteria 
AND the top filters will remain editable with "View" button still enabled

title: Edit Payroll Forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing Payroll Forecast Utility
AND edit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit button
custom_expected:
THEN system should reload the form in edit mode
AND all of the filters should become disabled
AND the "View" button at the top of the page should also be disabled or not display
AND Payroll details section should be displayed in edit mode, per the wireframe
AND the only values that should not be editable in the Payroll details are the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed
(Additional values that cannot be edited are detailed in the story #125729051.LABELS)

title: Add new Cash Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Add Transaction" button is displayed beneath the Cash Transactions portion of the utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Transaction"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction
AND an "Add Transaction" button should become enabled when all of the required fields have been entered properly
AND clicking this "Add Transaction" button should close modal, and populate Cash Transaction table of BOTH LRD and CBT payroll report utility with cash transaction information for selected Org
AND the reverse of the transaction shhould also be added to the counterpart's cash transactions table so that for one it appears as a positive, and the other as a negative. (Ex: If Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000, then ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added)
AND if the filter is set to "All" then the cash transaction should only be displayed once

title: Save changes to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
AND "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should save all of the entered values, and reload the utility in View mode
AND successful blue notification should display

title: View which rows have been manually updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND changes to a player's details have been manually modified in the Payroll section of Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Section of Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a "Reset" button should appear in the row associated with the player whose details were changed 
AND once changes have been saved a green check should appear in view mode

title: Payroll Forecast Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN accessing and updating the Payroll Forecast Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user
custom_steps:
WHEN a user (LRD - Contracts - Admin role group, by default) with this permission set logs in 
AND user navigates to Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Payroll Forecast tab should appear on the Major Contracts Dashboard
AND user should be able to access and update Payroll Forecast Utility 
BUT users without this permission should not be able to see "Payroll Forecast" tab
AND users without this permission should not be able to view the utility anywhere in the system

title: As an LRD user I want to be able to print the Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility
AND there is a "Print" button available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print
custom_expected:
THEN system should run the Payroll Forecast Utility report with the same criteria as are currently selected on screen
AND the report should run successfully just as if it had been run directly from the Reports widget

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the club user has logged in 
AND has clicked Major Contracts from the Left nav tab
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Deferred Compensation Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Club's Deferred Compensation funding utility will load 
AND The Org displayed will be locked to the Club user's Org (cannot view other Orgs). 
AND "Funding As Of" will default to July of the current year through July, and July of the following year through December. (Ex: In August 2016 this will read July 2017) 
AND Discount Rate is defaulted to 5%.

title: View player's details in the Deferred Comp funding screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp funding screen 
AND is viewing an Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN the user expands the row of a specific player
custom_expected: THEN expanding a row will display as many rows as are needed within that expansion to capture the information for the player, including all payment sources relevant to the current values entered into the Deferred Comp Funding screen.

title: As a user I want to be able to print the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with permission to print the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print
custom_expected:
THEN system  should print the deferred comp utility as it is displayed on the screen starting
AND the report and layout should match the specifications

title: As a user I want to view each payment source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Screen 
AND if viewing a specific's Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN they expand a Player row
custom_expected:
THEN the sources column will change from the number of sources when the row was unexpanded to listening out each payment source. 
AND the number of payment sources should match the number that displayed when the row was unexpanded 
AND Each Payment Source will display the Date, Amount and Present Value of the deferred compensation associated with that payment source. 
AND  Each player will also have a Payment Source labeled "Totals" that will display the total Amount deferred (Amt), the total amount funded as of the entered date (fnd) and the present value of the deferred comp (PV) and the present value of the funded deferred comp (Fnd PV).

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Deferred Comp Funding Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Deferred Comp Funding" is an option in the Report Listing widget with a Category of Payroll
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Deferred Comp Funding report
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to set the prompts according to the documentation
AND clubs should ONLY be able to select their own Org
AND the data displayed in the Deferred Comp Funding report should equal the data generated by the Deferred Comp Utility when the same criteria are entered
AND the report and layout should match the specifications
AND a new permission group to control the visibility of this report should be created and added to the existing admin-xxx-all user ids

title: As a user I want to run the Multi-Year Report - Player Details report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Multi-Year Report - Player Details" is a report in the Report listing widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects this report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch the prompts according to the requirements (including those delivered in prior stories)
AND entering the desired prompts and running the report should work and match the requirements
AND the report should have an LDAP associated with it

custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Competitive Balance Tax Assessment' report from the widget 
AND enters desired prompts
custom_expected: THEN the report will load with the entered prompts in separate tab.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Payroll Player Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Player Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Player Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Player Details" report will be launched depending on the selection. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:

"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Team Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Team Details" report will launch depending on what was selected. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user, I want to run the Payroll Player Details Report Straight to Excel
custom_preconds: GIVEN  EBIS1 "Run Excel Report" version of the player details report has been replicated in EBIS2
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to reports widget
custom_expected:
THEN the popup to run the Payroll - Player Details report should have a "Run Excel" button which generates this document
AND  columns and layout of the printed excel report will match ebis1
